## Timestamp.now() method

Creates a new timestamp with the current date, with millisecond precision.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static now(): Timestamp;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

[Timestamp](./firestore_lite.timestamp.md)

a new timestamp representing the current date.
